summary: Love to kill People in any city, but dont want to have to pay a fine? Well This mod Takes away ALL fines in skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Love to kill People in any city, but dont want to have to pay a fine? Well This mod Takes away ALL fines in skyrim!

Takes Away The Following Fines

-Murder
-Theft
-Werewolf Transformation
-Attacking NPC
-Pick Pocketing
-Etc.
Any Crimes I Forgot to Change? Please Share!
author: TerrifyingToddler
